Phobia listens to the battle through the baby attatched to 
Magmatron."What fools these Destrons be."
Phobia almost admired Magmatrons gall, he obviously knew the 
importance of stopping that ship. Unfortunately there was still the 
factor of what would happen if Magmatron succeeds in capturing the 
ship.
"Open frequency to the Maximal base.""Automatic repeat, Attention 
Maximals, I'm requesting permission to land, please send your 
representatives out front to await my arrival, this could be the end 
of the war, or the key to the survival of countless generations of 
life."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> *Mantella continues firing away at the ship, now getting angered 
because it's not doing that much damage*
